Container.Name: JDownloader Discord Monitor
Container.Overview: Monitors one or more JDownloader instances via MyJDownloader and sends periodic, detailed Discord embeds showing active downloads, progress, and speed. Supports multiple devices, multilingual output (EN/DE), and fully automated status updates. Ideal for automation setups with Unraid and Real-Debrid.

Config.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Config.Description: Discord webhook URL for sending status messages

Config.Name: MyJDownloader Email
Config.Description: Email address for your MyJDownloader account

Config.Name: Devices
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of JDownloader device names

Config.Name: Update Interval (seconds)
Config.Description: Interval between Discord updates in seconds

Config.Name: Language
Config.Description: Language setting: 'en' for English or 'de' for German
